entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers early this evening except a few wet flurries over higher terrain. Clearing late this evening. Snow level 1100 metres lowering to near valley bottom this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 11.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near noon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 4 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 27 March 2023
